page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: {THE MOTORWAY,HIGHWAYS,ROADS. Today we drove through Droitwich and on to have a look at Motorway M5 junction 5 improvements. We saw a lot of lorries and machines as well as people.It looked as though other roads joining this motorway were being built. We know that the motorway is only 2 lanes wide so they are going to add another lane to make 3 lanes.This is due to the increase in traffic.We noticed several diversion signs through the town.These were directing traffic from junction 5 through Droitwich via the ring road. We can expect much more heavy traffic such as transport lorries and large coaches to be using the roads in our area while this work is being done.
